attributes.action: launch a public inquiry to investigate the Lockerbie bombing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, ask the Prime Minister to launch a public inquiry to investigate the events of that fateful day. Moreover, we ask the Prime Minister to make sure that the public inquiry investigates the grounds of the conviction of Abdelbaset Ali Mohmed Al Megrahi.
